Who am I?

I’m Preksha Kashyap (Preɪkʃa Kʌʃyʌp for those of you who know a thing or two about the International Phonetic Alphabet). You could liken the pronunciation of my name to: Pray-ksha Cuh-sh-yup as well.

I’m currently an undergraduate student of the Computer Engineering programme at the University of Waterloo!

I enjoy taking photos using my Canon XSi (though I am by no means a pro). I also really like perusing my feeds (see: Reading ) and enjoy gaming from time to time (Portal I & II, Team Fortress 2, Kingdom Hearts I & II, Metal Gear Solid 4).
